channel.title: The HTML Hobbyist FAQs Feed
channel.description: Updates when new questions are answered on the FAQs page.

item.title: Why are you doing this?
item.description: I’ve never met them, I don’t know who they are, but I know there’s someone out there that’s going to make a website that I’m just going to love...

item.title: What’s so important about HTML?

item.title: Is there really still room for hobbyist websites?

item.title: How long have you been building websites?
